app.name: Box2D Balls
app.long_description:
Box2D + Wiimote = Fun!
Press A to create Balls Hold B and tilt the Wiimote to adjust gravity Press 1 to clear the screen
Thanks to Erin Catto for Box2D! Also thanks to the authors of libwiisprite, wiiuse and libogc! And of course thanks to team twiizers who made Wii homebrew possible!
